Articles.Content:
I've just loaded up KSP today and in the VAB and SPH, no parts show up. I'm playing version 1.0.4, and the only mods I have installed are MechJeb and The Mun (Pocket Edition). Could someone please help me with this? I was planning to make a kerbal transporter today.

-PineCone

It happen to me from time to time.

For me, the only mod that seem to increase the amount of time it happen is Dang-it or Entropy.

The only work-around I find is simply to quit KSP and re-open it when it happen.

(yeah, I know it's not fun but it's the only thing I can do :/)

(also, when it happen to me, if I manage to show the parts(after clicking everywhere in the part menu), I notice I can't place them AND that I can find kerbals and flags in it. When I hover the mouse over them, they grow; I even can "put" them on the craft(it won't clip, they will just show up as if they were placed; yes, I already launched a craft with that bug to see if I would see the kerbals: they don't show up in flight )

I've got kerbals and flags in my parts menu too, but for me, restarting doesn't help.

I'm not playing in 64-bit mode, in case you were wondering.

-PineCone

I've got kerbals and flags in my parts menu too, but for me, restarting doesn't help.

[...]

Do you mean that,after the restart, the parts are still missing or that they disappear after a while?
I mean that the parts are still missing.

I would suggest you to try to restart it, then creating a new save instead of continuing with your current one.

It might be a corrupted save(well, I don't really know. My parts were alway showing up again :/ )
Nope, already tried that.
did you tried again without the mods?
I would do that, but then I'd lose the ships with the mod parts.
Hi Pinecone, did you have module manager installed?

You won't lose the .craft saves, but I guess you were talking about ships already loaded?

Try with a new save, that way you won't lose anything.

EDIT: support-ninja'd by Sal
Nope, just MechJeb and The Mun (Pocket Edition).

Did you used it in the past?

In the game data folder, is there only file directly related to The mun(pocket edition) and mechjeb?
I've never used Module Manager before.

Any other mods you used before and deleted?

What folders is there in the GameData folder.
Just 'MechJeb2' 'munPocketEdition' and 'Squad'.

Pinecone, please see this thread.

We will need your output_log and your save file.

We will also need to know if you made any changes to KSP since it was last working.

Output log: http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=01732095243169456628

Save file: http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=07725088546849396672

Okay, your log contains this.

File 'C:/Kerbal Space Program/KSP_Data/../GameData\ModuleManager.TechTree' does not exist

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

at RDTechTree.LoadTechTree (System.String filePath, System.Collections.Generic.List`1 rdNodes) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

And your save file contains this.

CAREER

{

TechTreeUrl = GameData\ModuleManager.TechTree

StartingFunds = 25000

StartingScience = 0

StartingReputation = 0

FundsGainMultiplier = 1

RepGainMultiplier = 1

ScienceGainMultiplier = 1

FundsLossMultiplier = 1

RepLossMultiplier = 1

}

So either install module manager or edit the save to this.

TechTreeUrl = GameData\Squad\Resources\TechTree.cfg

Then it'll be fine

Thank you so much! It works! Here, have some of my .craft files to say thank you!

http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=83282325564611940723

http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=02724421454486761183

http://s000.tinyupload.com/?file_id=74249567866229994845

-PineCone
Glad it worked, and thanks

You're welcome!

Also, what did you think of my rovers? They're not the best, but I like them.
The rovers are fine
this happens to me, I have installed realism overhaul via ckan and when i start ksp theres no parts.
